entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
